oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interview with ʻAzīzah Saʻīd al-‘Āydī and others
مقابلة مع عزيزة سعيد العايدي وآخرون
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Short stories, Arabic--Palestine
Wit and humor--Palestine
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Attacks; Carriages; Caves; Cheating; Children's stories; Cooking; Escape; Food; Generations; Ogres; Sisters; Vendors; Aḥmad Pasha al-Jazzār, approximately 1730-1804; Cheating; Children; Dietary practices; Egypt; Gold; Imposters; Jinn; Land deeds; Love; Magic; Social norms; Socio-economic conditions; Theft; Traditional medical procedures; Village leaders; Arrest; Aṭrash, Sulṭān, 1891-1982; Bedouins; Chivalry; Christians; Damascus (Syria); Diseases; Elderly people; French Mandate of Syria and Lebanon, 1923-1943; Hospitality; Hunting; Leaders; Married couples; Mothers; Poems; Praying; Rural life; Saints; Shaykhs; The Great Syrian Revolt, 1925-1927; Traitors; Employment; Humor; Jokes; Junblāṭ, Walīd, 1948-; Killing; Lawyers; Leaders; Revenge; Shaykhs; Thieves
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSF: Bzaym, al-Shaykh Bandar (Doctor); al-Khanjar, Adʹham (Revolutionary); Falḥah, Ḥassan (Civil servant); al-Asʻad, Aḥmad (Leader).
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSFAR: بزيم، الشيخ بندر (دكتور); خنجر، ادهم (ثائر); فلحة، حسّان (موظف مدني); الاسد، احمد (قائد); الاسد، احمد (قائد).
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded with ʻAzīzah Saʻīd al-‘Āydī and others, female and resides in Mar Elias Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع عزيزة سعيد العايدي وآخرون، أنثى وتقيم في مخيم مار إلياس للاجئين الفلسطينيين، لبنان.
